name: MindSmack
tag_list: web-design, 3d, animation, mobile, applications, facebook, interactive, advertising, iphone, 3g, banner-ads, landing-pages, illustration, maya, after-effects, post-production, new-york-city, times-square, commercials, audio, sound-design
overview:
MindSmack launches MindSmack Games for iOS devices.

http://www.MindSmackGames.com

Current titles include FlySmacker, Baby Tap and Learn, Guess Who - Silly Shadows, Singing City and Toy Store Delivery Truck.

MindSmack.com and MindSmack.tv specialize in interactive web design, flash, animation, mobile and iphone app development, FastMall app, 3d, ad design, video, post production and web development in the world.

MindSmack has won the following awards:

1st Annual DesignFirms.org Award 2nd Annual DesignFirms.org Award 5 FWA Awards Cool Web Award

100’s more.

Recent projects:

http://www.CitiPrivatePass.com

http://www.AmericanExpress.com

http://www.Pepsi.com.mx

http://www.Marines.com

http://www.Palmers.com

http://www.FastMall.com

http://www.MindSmack.com

http://www.MapEverywhere.com
